'''2.1.5373''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.5372''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.5371''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[launcher]] released on June 25, 2019.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-10230}}: Erases all launch settings after computer hard-locks.
* {{bug|MCL-11002}}: Version List not in Alphabetical Order on Play Screen.
